title: Traders Wanted: Looking for Sovereign 150 and EPDG, plus a few SL
author: BBT206

posts.post_title: Traders Wanted: Looking for Sovereign 150 and EPDG, plus a few SL
posts.post_content:
I am working a Sovereign 150 and EPDG subsets.  Let me know if you can help me out.  Looking for SGC 30-50.  Email me at [url]bdbrownbaseball@gmail.com[/url].  Thanks, Bill

Below is a list of some of the cards I am looking for.

Sovereign 150
Ames Portrait
Bresnahan Portrait
Bridwell No Cap

Just added a few SL to my wantlist.  Bill
